vulnerabilities.title: Improper Input Validation in url-js
vulnerabilities.description: The package url-js before 2.1.0 is vulnerable to Improper Input Validation due to improper parsing, which makes it is possible for the hostname to be spoofed. http://\\\\\\\\localhost and http://localhost are the same URL. However, the hostname is not parsed as localhost, and the backslash is reflected as it is.
